about_the_game:
Unique Identy is a roguelite action platformer inspired by the metroidvania genre. You’ll be tasked with surviving waves of enemies coming from the platform. There are no save points; kill, die, learn, and repeat.

In Unique Identy, your goal is to survive against the evil enemies approaching from the platform. Each time you kill an enemy, you earn points and face tougher foes. As a mortal, your only options are to move, explore, and fight to grow stronger. While you may be mortal, the points you earn are permanent. As you defeat enemies, more will come at you, offering the chance to earn even more points.

Using your special abilities, you can gain an advantage over enemies with supernatural powers. By practicing the "kill, die, learn, repeat" principle, you can eventually overcome your foes.
